Message.Title: I've got 14,500 HPQ shares, DELL is beaten... R&D spending is a joke, DELL can't make it
Message.Msg: DELL isn't an innovator. It'll get crushed by LENOVO and HP until it is bled white.

Message.Title: DELL authorizes a huge new buyback plan says
GDOT upgraded from Neutral to Overweight, Sell DELL & Buy GDOT
Message.Msg: Yesterday (09/05) Piper Jaffray upgraded GDOT from Neutral to Overweight Is it worth hanging on to DELL with a PEG ratio of 1.2? Won't it be wise for small to medium investors to sell DELL and buy GDOT whose PEG ratio is just about 0.40, which is just 1/3rd that of DELL ... The 09/05 upgrade of GDOT by Piper Jaffray from Neutral to Overweight could just be the beginning of a monster run up ... Could GDOT be closing above $20/share or above $25/share by end of this year ...

Message.Title: selling pressure
Message.Msg: Is this an indication that Dell is doomed? Gladden Brian T Senior Vice President 2012-09-04 Sell 25,000 378,916 sold at $10.56 Gladden Brian T Senior Vice President 2012-08-03 Sell 68,750 403,916 sold at $11.63 Gladden Brian T is dell's cfo. He even doesn't want to wait for the dividend. At today's price, only those people (dell's officers or directors) can sell dell for profit, because they can get the shares for free or at very low cost.

Message.Title: DELL Aproves First Qtrly Divid of 8 cents
Message.Msg: The dividend will be paid to all shareholders of record as of the close of business on Qct. 1, 2012. The dividend will be paid on Oct. 22, 2012.

Message.Title: Bought DELL by accident today, happy to find out they start to pay a divi of 3% a year
Message.Msg: Bought DELL by accident today, happy to find out they start to pay a divi of 3% a year. So glad at today's price, I am going to earn 3% each year, much better than put money in bank. I will hold the 21000 shares for quite some time.

Topic.Title: Bought DELL by accident today, happy to find out they start to pay a divi of 3% a year

Message.Msg: I'm finding it hard to underestand WHY... oh WHY ... does Kramer constantly degregate Dell, yet Motley indicates that DELL is a good investment... He is one of the harshest analysts, when it come to DELL ... IMVHO, I still feel tha, with over 3,000,000 viewers, he has a negative agenda for a purpose ... I'm not liking him tooooo much !!!

Hmmm, what a day in the market for most of the stocks except Dell. It's trading as if it's a penny stock. They make so much money and still getting pounded, day after day. Even RIMM and NOK jumped 3.5% today. Go figure! Even HPQ jumps 2% today and is 5% above the low. OTOH, DELL is at 52 week low. What's wrong with DELL? I-N-C-R-E-D-I-B-L-E!!!
